channel.title: I need some help with my server
channel.description:
i got some errors when starting my server and i cant get my shop to work it allways comes up this error
[code]----------------------------------------------------------------- Starting HellzEnd Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ----------------------------------------------------------------- [client-1-hell]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-hell]: atNPC 1: 1161 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -44 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:14773) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13792) at client.process(client.java:13762) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) HellscapePK Server [fatal] - exception [client-1-hell]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-hell]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-hell]: Case 185: 9154 Game saved for player hell ClientHandler: Client hell disconnected.[/code]
also here is my shop
[code]spawn = 1658 3209 3812 0 0 0 0 0 1 armour shop[/code]
[code]shop = 44 @whi@armour@red@_shop! 1 1 4585 2000000 4087 2000000 3140 2000000 1187 2000000 1149 2000000 1201 24300 1163 24300 1127 24300 1079 24300 1199[/code]
BTW it works when i put it into a command can some 1 help me plz

item.title: I need some help with my server
item.dc:creator: @nemo296 nemo296
item.description:
@nemo296 wrote:

i got some errors when starting my server and i cant get my shop to work it allways comes up this error

[code]-----------------------------------------------------------------
Starting HellzEnd Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

[client-1-hell]: Case 130: 0
[client-1-hell]: atNPC 1: 1161
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -44
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:14773)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:13792)
at client.process(client.java:13762)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:47)
HellscapePK Server [fatal] - exception
[client-1-hell]: Case 130: 0
[client-1-hell]: Case 130: 0
[client-1-hell]: Case 185: 9154
Game saved for player hell
ClientHandler: Client hell disconnected.[/code]

also here is my shop

spawn = 1658		3209	3812	0	0	0	0	0	1	armour shop
shop = 44	@whi@armour@red@_shop!				1	1	4585	2000000	4087	2000000	3140	2000000	1187	2000000	1149	2000000	1201	24300	1163	24300	1127	24300	1079	24300	1199

BTW it works when i put it into a command can some 1 help me plz

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help with my server
